roleset.name: to approach
roleset.note: NEAR-V NOTES: Frames file for 'near' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. Comparison with 'approach'. (from near.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: transitive
example.text: Investors usually do n't want [*-1] to take physical delivery of a contract , [*-1]preferring instead [*-2] to profit from its price swings and then end any obligation [*] to take delivery or make delivery as it nears expiration .

example.name: intransitive
example.text: CAPITAL TRAVELS to Europe as 1992 unification nears .

roleset.name: spatially close
roleset.note: NEAR-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on SMS. (from near.01-j)

role.descr: in relation to, near to what

example.name: arg1
example.text: Not sure if we are added yet but figured I would ask since we are near . Thanks .
